# This file contains encoded values for sprites in the game
# Each sprite is 16x16, stored in 64 lines with 4 pixels on each line
# Each pixel has the possibility for 6 colors, and information is stored in 3 bits:
# 000 - Black (R = 0, G = 0, B = 0)
# 001 - Blue (R = 99, G = 155, B = 255)
# 010 - Yellow (R = 251, G = 242, B = 54)
# 011 - Red (R = 255, G = 50, B = 50)
# 100 - Crimson (R = 172, G = 50, B = 50)
# 111 - White (R = 255, G = 255, B = 255)
# Here is the format:
# [Start(2)] [First Pixel(3)] [Second Pixel(3)] [Third Pixel(3)] [Fourth Pixel(3)] [End(2)]
# [Start(2)] - Unused (Always 00)
# [End(2)] - Unused (Always 00)

# Short Corner [Bottom Left]
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000100100100100
0000000000000000
